# grunt-contrib-jshint [![Build Status](https://travis-ci.org/gruntjs/grunt-contrib-jshint.png?branch=master)](https://travis-ci.org/gruntjs/grunt-contrib-jshint)

> Validate files with JSHint.



## Getting Started
This plugin requires Grunt `~0.4.0`

If you haven't used [Grunt](http://gruntjs.com/) before, be sure to check out the [Getting Started](http://gruntjs.com/getting-started) guide, as it explains how to create a [Gruntfile](http://gruntjs.com/sample-gruntfile) as well as install and use Grunt plu
